films.title: The Shawshank Redemption
films.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

films.title: The Godfather
films.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

films.title: The Godfather: Part II
films.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

films.title: 12 Angry Men
films.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

films.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
films.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

films.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
films.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

films.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
films.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

films.title: Forrest Gump
films.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

films.title: The Matrix
films.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

films.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
films.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

films.title: Saving Private Ryan
films.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

films.title: Schindler's List
films.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

films.title: The Silence of the Lambs
films.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

films.title: The Usual Suspects
films.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

films.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
films.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

films.title: The Matrix
films.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

films.title: The Lion King
films.description: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

films.title: The Green Mile
films.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

films.title: The Sixth Sense
films.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

films.title: Goodfellas
films.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

films.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
films.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

films.title: The Silence of the Lambs
films.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

films.title: Saving Private Ryan
films.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

films.title: The Lion King
films.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

films.title: Schindler's List
films.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

films.title: The Matrix
films.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

films.title: Fight Club
films.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

films.title: The Sixth Sense
films.description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

films.title: Saving Private Ryan
films.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

films.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
films.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

films.title: Goodfellas
films.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

films.title: The Lion King
films.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

films.title: The Matrix
films.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

films.title: Gladiator
films.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

films.title: Jurassic Park
films.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

films.title: The Social Network
films.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

films.title: Moneyball
films.description: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

films.title: Skyfall
films.description: Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. Whilst MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

films.title: The French Dispatch
films.description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional 20th-century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in 'The French Dispatch' magazine.

films.title: Dune
films.description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

films.title: The Lost Daughter
films.description: A woman's beach vacation takes a dark turn when she begins to confront the troubles of her past.

films.title: The Tragedy of Macbeth
films.description: A Scottish lord becomes convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland, and his ambitious wife supports him in his plans of seizing power.

films.title: Belfast
films.description: A young boy and his working class family experience the tumultuous late 1960s in Northern Ireland.

films.title: Deadpool
films.description: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.

films.title: The Lion King
films.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

films.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
films.description: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

films.title: Raging Bull
films.description: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

films.title: Avatar
films.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

films.title: Youth in Revolt
films.description: While his trailer trash parents teeter on the edge of divorce, a snarky teen with a taste for 18th-century literature embarks on a quest to find a girl who shares his interests.

films.title: You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
films.description: Follows a pair of married couples, Alfie and Helena, and their daughter Sally and husband Roy, as their passions, ambitions, and anxieties lead them into trouble and out of their minds.

films.title: When in Rome
films.description: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

films.title: What Happens in Vegas
films.description: A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.

films.title: Water For Elephants
films.description: After his parents' death, veterinary student Jacob Jankowski is left without a family and a future. He stumbles into the circus world and falls in love with Marlena, a performer married to the cruel August.

films.title: WALL-E
films.description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

films.title: Waitress
films.description: Jenna is a pregnant, unhappily married waitress in the deep south. She meets a newcomer to her town and falls into an unlikely relationship as a last attempt at happiness.

films.title: Waiting For Forever
films.description: A Hollywood-set romantic tale of a guy who is content to live his life without a job yet with the love of his life, a young actress.

films.title: Valentine's Day
films.description: Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.

films.title: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married
films.description: The big screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage, and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

films.title: Twilight
films.description: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.

films.title: Twilight: Breaking Dawn
films.description: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

films.title: The Ugly Truth
films.description: An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.

films.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
films.description: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and, in her depression, she falls into yet another difficult relationship - this time with her close friend, Jacob Black.

films.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
films.description: A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.

films.title: The Proposal
films.description: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her Visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

films.title: The Invention of Lying
films.description: A comedy set in a world where no one has ever lied, until a writer seizes the opportunity for personal gain.

films.title: The Heartbreak Kid
films.description: A newlywed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

films.title: The Duchess
films.description: A chronicle of the life of 18th-century aristocrat Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire, who was reviled for her extravagant political and personal life.

films.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
films.description: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences for his love life and career.

films.title: The Back-up Plan
films.description: A romantic comedy centered on a woman who conceives twins through artificial insemination, only to meet the man of her dreams on the very same day.

films.title: Tangled
films.description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

films.title: Something Borrowed
films.description: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.

films.title: She's Out of My League
films.description: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.

films.title: Sex and the City 2
films.description: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

films.title: Sex and the City 2
films.description: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

films.title: Sex and the City
films.description: A New York City writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

films.title: Remember Me
films.description: A romantic drama centered on two new lovers: Tyler, whose parents have split in the wake of his brother's suicide, and Ally, who lives each day to the fullest since witnessing her mother's murder.

films.title: Rachel Getting Married
films.description: A young woman who has been in and out of rehab for the past ten years, returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

films.title: Penelope
films.description: A modern romantic tale about a young aristocratic heiress born under a curse that can only be broken when she finds true love with 'one who will love her faithfully.'

films.title: P.S. I Love You
films.description: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

films.title: Over Her Dead Body
films.description: A ghost tries to sabotage her former boyfriend's current relationship with a psychic.

films.title: Our Family Wedding
films.description: The weeks leading up to a young couple's wedding are comic and stressful, especially as their respective fathers try to lay to rest their feud.

films.title: One Day
films.description: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Em are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.

films.title: Not Easily Broken
films.description: A car accident and shifting affections test the bond between a married couple.

films.title: No Reservations
films.description: The life of a top chef changes when she becomes the guardian of her young niece.

films.title: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
films.description: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

films.title: New Year's Eve
films.description: The lives of several couples and singles in New York intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.

films.title: My Week with Marilyn
films.description: During Marilyn Monroe's visit to England to film 'The Prince and the Showgirl,' the American icon and a young assistant director spend a week together and fall in love.

films.title: Music and Lyrics
films.description: A washed up singer is given a couple days to compose a chart-topping hit for an aspiring teen sensation. Though he's never written a decent lyric in his life, he sparks with an offbeat younger woman with a flair for words.

films.title: Monte Carlo
films.description: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

films.title: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
films.description: Guinevere Pettigrew, a middle-aged London governess, finds herself unfairly dismissed from her job. An attempt to gain new employment catapults her into the glamorous world and dizzying social whirl of an American actress and singer, Delysia Lafosse.

films.title: Midnight in Paris
films.description: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

films.title: Marley & Me
films.description: A family learns important life lessons from their adorable, but naughty and neurotic dog.

films.title: Mamma Mia!
films.description: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular '70s group ABBA.

films.title: Mamma Mia!
films.description: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular 1970s group ABBA.

films.title: Made of Honor
films.description: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

films.title: Love Happens
films.description: A widower whose book about coping with loss turns him into a best-selling self-help guru, falls for the hotel florist where his seminar is given, only to learn that he hasn't yet truly confronted his wife's passing.

films.title: Love & Other Drugs
films.description: A young woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer in 1990s Pittsburgh.

films.title: Life as We Know It
films.description: Two single adults become caregivers to an orphaned girl when their mutual best friends die in an accident.

films.title: License to Wed
films.description: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

films.title: Letters to Juliet
films.description: Sophie dreams of becoming a writer and travels to Verona, Italy where she meets the Secretaries of Juliet, a group that responds to letters written to Shakespeare's Juliet. She answers a letter that has been lost for 50 years and inspires its author to travel to Italy in search of her long-lost love.

films.title: Leap Year
films.description: A woman who has an elaborate scheme to propose to her boyfriend on Leap Day, an Irish tradition which occurs every four years, faces a major setback when bad weather threatens to derail her planned trip to Dublin. With the help of an Irish innkeeper, she embarks on a cross-country adventure to make it to the city and find the man of her dreams.

films.title: Knocked Up
films.description: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant.

films.title: Killers
films.description: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

films.title: Just Wright
films.description: A physical therapist falls for the basketball player she is helping recover from a career-threatening injury.

films.title: Jane Eyre
films.description: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.

films.title: It's Complicated
films.description: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. But the complicated fact is they're divorced and he's remarried.

films.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
films.description: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.

films.title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
films.description: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

films.title: He's Just Not That Into You
films.description: This Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.

films.title: Good Luck Chuck
films.description: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

films.title: Going the Distance
films.description: A romantic comedy centered on a guy and a gal who try to keep their love alive as they shuttle back and forth between New York and San Francisco to see one another.

films.title: Gnomeo and Juliet
films.description: The neighboring gardens of Montague and Capulet are at war, but the gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet, are in love.

films.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
films.description: While attending his brother's wedding, a serial womanizer is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends.

films.title: Four Christmases
films.description: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas Day.

films.title: Fireproof
films.description: In an attempt to save his marriage, a firefighter uses a 40-day experiment known as 'The Love Dare'.

films.title: Enchanted
films.description: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

films.title: Dear John
films.description: A romantic drama about a soldier who falls for a conservative college student while he's home on leave.

films.title: Beginners
films.description: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer and that he has a young male lover.

films.title: Across the Universe
films.description: The music of The Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

films.title: A Serious Man
films.description: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

films.title: A Dangerous Method
films.description: A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.

films.title: 27 Dresses
films.description: After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.

films.title: (500) Days of Summer
films.description: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

films.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
films.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

films.title: Prometheus
films.description: Following clues to the origin of mankind, a team finds a structure on a distant moon, but they soon realize they are not alone.

films.title: Split
films.description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

films.title: A Dangerous Method
films.description: A look at how the intense relationship between Carl Jung and Sigmund Freud gives birth to psychoanalysis.

films.title: Sing
films.description: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

films.title: Suicide Squad
films.description: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

films.title: The Great Wall
films.description: In ancient China, a group of European mercenaries encounters a secret army that maintains and defends the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

films.title: La La Land
films.description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

films.title: Hidden Figures
films.description: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the US space program.

films.title: Rogue One
films.description: The Rebel Alliance makes a risky move to steal the plans for the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

films.title: Moana
films.description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

films.title: Colossal
films.description: Gloria is an out-of-work party girl forced to leave her life in New York City and move back home. When reports surface that a giant creature is destroying Seoul, she gradually comes to the realization that she is somehow connected to this phenomenon.

films.title: Arrival
films.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

films.title: Gold
films.description: Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia.

films.title: Manchester by the Sea
films.description: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

films.title: Hounds of Love
films.description: A teenage girl is abducted by a depraved couple and witnesses terrible, unholy things.

films.title: The Secret Life of Pets
films.description: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

films.title: Hacksaw Ridge
films.description: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

films.title: Jason Bourne
films.description: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

films.title: Lion
films.description: A five-year-old Indian boy is adopted by an Australian couple after getting lost hundreds of kilometers from home. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

films.title: Trolls
films.description: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the overly-cautious, curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

films.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
films.description: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra-Solar threat. But will mankind's new space defenses be enough?

films.title: Paris pieds nus
films.description: Fiona visits Paris for the first time to assist her myopic Aunt Martha. Catastrophes ensue, mainly involving Dom, a homeless man who has yet to have an emotion or thought he was afraid of expressing.

films.title: Bahubali: The Beginning
films.description: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

films.title: Dead Awake
films.description: A young woman must save herself and her friends from an ancient evil that stalks its victims through the real-life phenomenon of sleep paralysis.

films.title: Bad Moms
films.description: When three overworked and under-appreciated moms are pushed beyond their limits, they ditch their conventional responsibilities for a jolt of long overdue freedom, fun and comedic self-indulgence.

films.title: Assassin's Creed
films.description: Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar de Nerha and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, before taking on the secret Templar society.

films.title: Why Him?
films.description: A holiday gathering threatens to go off the rails when Ned Fleming realizes that his daughter's Silicon Valley billionaire boyfriend is about to pop the question.

films.title: Nocturnal Animals
films.description: A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.

films.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
films.description: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

films.title: Deadpool
films.description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

films.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
films.description: Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

films.title: Captain America: Civil War
films.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

films.title: Doctor Strange
films.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

films.title: The Magnificent Seven
films.description: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.
Alienated, hopeful-filmmaker Pat Johnson's epic story growing up in rural Illinois, falling in love, and becoming the first fan of the movie that changed everything.

films.title: Sausage Party
films.description: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

films.title: Moonlight
films.description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

films.title: Don't Fuck in the Woods
films.description: A group of friends are going on a camping trip to celebrate graduating college. But once they enter the woods, the proverbial shit starts to hit the fan.

films.title: The Founder
films.description: The story of Ray Kroc, a salesman who turned two brothers' innovative fast food eatery, McDonald's, into the biggest restaurant business in the world, with a combination of ambition, persistence, and ruthlessness.

films.title: Lowriders
films.description: A young street artist in East Los Angeles is caught between his father's obsession with lowrider car culture, his ex-felon brother and his need for self-expression.

films.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
films.description: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

films.title: Miss Sloane
films.description: In the high-stakes world of political power-brokers, Elizabeth Sloane is the most sought after and formidable lobbyist in D.C. But when taking on the most powerful opponent of her career, she finds winning may come at too high a price.

films.title: Fallen
films.description: A young girl finds herself in a reform school after therapy since she was blamed for the death of a young boy. At the school she finds herself drawn to a fellow student, unaware that he is an angel, and has loved her for thousands of years.

films.title: Star Trek Beyond
films.description: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.

films.title: The Last Face
films.description: A director (Charlize Theron) of an international aid agency in Africa meets a relief aid doctor (Javier Bardem) amidst a political/social revolution, and together face tough choices surrounding humanitarianism and life through civil unrest.

films.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
films.description: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

films.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
films.description: Vampire death dealer Selene fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

films.title: Mother's Day
films.description: Three generations come together in the week leading up to Mother's Day.

films.title: John Wick
films.description: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.

films.title: Silence
films.description: In the 17th century, two Portuguese Jesuit priests travel to Japan in an attempt to locate their mentor, who is rumored to have committed apostasy, and to propagate Catholicism.

films.title: Don't Breathe
films.description: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

films.title: Me Before You
films.description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

films.title: Their Finest
films.description: A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.

films.title: Sully
films.description: The story of Chesley Sullenberger, an American pilot who became a hero after landing his damaged plane on the Hudson River in order to save the flight's passengers and crew.

films.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
films.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

films.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
films.description: A father and son, both coroners, are pulled into a complex mystery while attempting to identify the body of a young woman, who was apparently harboring dark secrets.

films.title: The Girl on the Train
films.description: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

films.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
films.description: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

films.title: The Prestige
films.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

films.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
films.description: A spy organization recruits an unrefined, but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program, just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

films.title: Patriots Day
films.description: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.
